item.title: Volvo FH MK1 (FH12 and FH16) Premium 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Volvo FH MK1 (FH12 and FH16) Premium 1.50 ETS2

Independent truck model High quality 3D model

– High quality detailed exterior – High quality detailed interior

– High quality wheels and 3D tires – High quality reflection in mirrors – Correct location of exhaust gases – Correct position of the license plate – The model has its own interior – The model has its own sound

engine power selection (5 types) selection of transmission and gearbox (3 types) choice of cabins (2 types) chassis selection (4 types) selection of wheels and rims

The character sits correctly in the driver’s seat – correct placement of the Volvo logo – there is backlighting of the speedometer and tachometer needles

Working headlights, brake lights, tail lights, front and rear turn signals, steering wheel and reverse lights – working lights – working mirrors – Correct position of the player – There are elements of external tuning – Trailer cables – Support for interior accessories – Support for SISL accessory package – Supports all basic game functions – buy from a Volvo dealer or Acces Mod

Adapted to the latest game patch 1.50


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Discover North America v1.2.5 ATS
item.description:
Discover North America v1.2.5 ATS

Compatible version: 1.50.x

v1.2.5 – Sector Error fixes, made a lil oopsie – Recomputed CORRECTLY lol – Node linkage error fix – Removed support for Project Michigan until bug fix is released.

v1.2.0 – Nebraska Compatible – Bug Fixes by Matt Burb – South Dakota has been updated with new companies, new signage, new lighting – Upper Peninsula of Michigan has been updated with new companies, new signage, new lighting – Added Council Bluffs, Iowa (very WIP looking as it uses unfinished SCS roads) – Louisville rework WIP by Matt Burb – Philly rework WIP by Astranautica and Matt Burb – Boston rework WIP by Astranautica and Matt Burb – Added Davenport, Iowa – Added Hazard, Kentucky – New roads in multiple states – Added companies in parts of Mass, New York, New Jersey and Iowa – New tolls in Maryland, Delaware, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, New Hampshire and Maine – Recomputed Map. – Toronto Growth v1.2 – Boston v1.2 – Philadelphia v1.2

Welcome to Discover North America, the new and improved mod from our team combining Discover The North and American Expansion. Public release! Please note, I will only address bug reports made on the Discord

Release features; Boilerplate roads in most areas that SCS has not covered New Chicago Skyline New NYC Skyline Maine road layouts and DTN connections Kansas Compatible Thousands of Miles of new roads Realistic Tolls Carefully drawn highways, county routes, and roads Boilerplate towns in the Midwest SteelandCities New England Mod merged into AE Jacemeisters Midwest Expansion used as based, Updated for 1.50 by Matt Burb New Boarder Checkpoints Realistic Signage So much more

Load order: Project Michigan(newest) Discover North America (newest) Coast to Coast (newest)


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Brutal Environment HD + SOUND ENGINE only to 1.50.x ETS2
item.description:
Brutal Environment HD + SOUND ENGINE only to 1.50.x ETS2

The old brutal engine sounds are slowly being restored. First, I created the sound of my 1000 HP engine. You can listen to it in the attached video. (“Train diesel engine” and “King of the road” old game sound deja voux) A little insight into day and night driving in terms of visibility. Use it if you like it, if you don’t throw it away.

To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Asia Dream map v8.6 1.50 ETS2
item.description:
Asia Dream map v8.6 1.50 ETS2

Changelogs v8.6 – Compatible for 1.50 – 3 New cities in Azerbaijan Salyan,Neftchala and Bilasuvar – Reduced number of Vines due disappear

Road to Persian Gulf.Caucasus and Iran Over 63 cities in Caucasus Area – Beautiful scenary – Over 800km to cruising the road – Even with Flame tower in Baku

Requirement: – DLC to works

item.title: Sibirmap v2.8.1 ETS2
item.description:
Sibirmap v2.8.1 ETS2

Adaptation for version 1.50. The city of Ishim has been expanded. Ishim-Golyshmanovo (R-402) and Golyshmanovo-Berdyuzhye roads have been added. Minor edits have been made throughout the map. The package of high-quality graphic design elements for companies from Dragon’s Design studio has been expanded.


How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
